previous.excerpt:
I was thinking tonight about my portfolio and I came to a conclusion. There's
nothing to worry about ... Relax!!

What if the market tanks 50% tommorow and I lose half of my net worth? Then I
jotted down what I'd have on paper and I thought. .... Who the heck cares?! So
what?!

I'm in for 10 to 20…

localize.title: 没什么好担心的 放松！
localize.the_new_excerpt:
今晚我在思考我的作品集，我得出了一个结论。有...
没什么好担心的... 放松！

如果明天市场下跌50%，我损失了一半的净资产怎么办？那我...
把我会的东西记在纸上，我想。.... 谁在乎呢？所以
什么？

我在10到20... ...
